original: @265a ` bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags pa skye ba dran ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @265a ` bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags pa skye ba dran ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Blessed Noble Lady, the Recollection of Past Lives.

original: na mo bha ga wa te siddhi siddhe mo tsa ni mo ksha ni muktre aa ma le bi ma le nirma le aanda re panda re mangga lam /
analyzed: na mo bha ga wa te siddhi siddhe mo tsa ni mo ksha ni muktre aa ma le bi ma le nirma le aanda re panda re mangga lam /
translated: Namo bhagavate siddhi-siddhe mocanimokṣaṇi mukte āmale vimale nirmmale andhare paṇḍare maṅgalam

original: hi ra nye garbhe sarba tr'a pra ti ha te sv'a h'a /
analyzed: hi ra nye garbhe sarba tr'a pra ti ha te sv'a h'a /

original: gang zhig gzungs 'di 'dzin pa dang klog pa dang ston pa dang yi ger 'dri ba dang yi ger 'drir 'jug na /
analyzed: gang zhig gzungs 'di 'dzin pa dang klog pa dang ston pa dang yi ger 'dri ba dang yi ger 'drir 'jug na /
translated: Whoever upholds, reads, teaches, writes, or causes to be written this dhāraṇī,

original: gzungs 'di'i mthus de bskal ba brgyad khri bzhi stong du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzungs 'di'i mthus de bskal ba brgyad khri bzhi stong du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro //
translated: by the power of this dhāraṇī, will remember their past lives for eighty-four thousand eons.

original: bskal pa dgu khrir gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bskal pa dgu khrir gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro //
translated: For ninety thousand eons, they will become a universal monarch ruling the four continents.

original: nad thams cad dang rnam par grol ba'i gzugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nad thams cad dang rnam par grol ba'i gzugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will be free from all illnesses and possess a liberated form.

original: 'phags pa skye ba dran pa'i gzungs rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'phags pa skye ba dran pa'i gzungs rdzogs so /
translated: The Noble Dhāraṇī of the Recollection of Past Lives is complete.

original: // / rgya dpe gser gyis bris pa las dharm'a bha dras bsgyur ba'o /
analyzed: // / rgya dpe gser gyis bris pa las dharm'a bha dras bsgyur ba'o /
translated: Translated from a golden manuscript by Dharmapāla.
